Posts.Content: Aug 23, 2007 09:57AM stired wrote: I just started radiation treatment last Tuesday and am having similar problems. I started experiencing dizziness and slight nausea on the 3rd day. When I mentioned it to the RN, she said that this is not a side effect of radiation. During the weekend, when I didn't have any treatments, it went away. Now on week 2 and by the 3rd day of the week, have severe dizziness again. Has anyone else experienced this?
Posts.Title: Radiation causing nausea and dizziness marymary897 Motherofall6
